title: Deploy UC Photography Portfolio to Production

requirements.summary: Prepare frontend application for production deployment to Internet Computer network
acceptanceCriteria: Application is successfully deployed to production canister
Production URL is accessible and serves the live application
All backend and frontend components are functional in production

file_operations.description: Verify production meta tags, canonical URLs, and ensure all asset references use production-ready paths for the UC Photography & Film portfolio site
Verify InternetIdentityProvider and QueryClient configurations are production-ready with appropriate canister IDs and network settings for ICP mainnet deployment
